page.title: 05Prestwood School in 100 yrs.
page.content: In the morning I woke up at 7.00hrs. and got out of bed. I summoned a service android to make my bed and get my breakfast. Then I got dressed and settled down to reprogram a service android to convert it into a cleaning android to be like a housewife, and tidy everything up. I finished that at about 12.00hrs. School didn't start until 17.00 hrs. and went on until 00.00hrs. For lunch I had a purple mixture that tasted like bilberries. After that I went to have my brain re-programmed for school. When 17.00hrs. came I got my bag with my tea and my homework in, and set off in my Bluggmobile. It looks quite like an E type Jaguar with wings. The first thing we did was Computer technology which lasted until 18.00 hrs. Then I went to the tower block for engineering and Art until 20.00 hrs. Cont......
